content: Is there a way in HAPI FHIR to force version aware updates on? I know HAPI FHIR does support version aware updates, but can you set the server to reject all API calls that do not supply ETag or ifMatch-propery? Tried to find this in the docs, but could only find mentions on how to set the general support on or off
my suggestion would be to add a filter that rejects calls that don't have the ETag header set
